tweets.text: Could this be Red Industries when informed of Walley’s Quarry permit breach?Get the ‘family’ onto the @EnvAgencyMids now it’s a minor breach! No, that would never happen,but you may think that I couldn’t possibly comment. 🤔Showtime! #stopthestink @StinkStopthe #omnishambles https://t.co/t5XwNeQJf2

The @EnvAgencyMids have now changed this text to "minor breach" (with no note of correction).

They need to provide urgent clarification as to why, and details of who asked them to make this change.

https://t.co/9vl5xaQgzq https://t.co/Y8O5rAs0qn

Newly completed #floodplain reconnection project on Dunston Beck, Lincs, turning former arable field into diverse wetland & meadow habitats. #Partnership managed by WTT's Tim Jacklin along with landowners @beeswaxfarming and funding partner @EnvAgencyMids

Now & then shots https://t.co/O8xhJ6pvgK https://t.co/rBoSg6oazw
@NROrman @thorneh @EnvAgency Could it not just be more silty run-off from the smaller tributary?

urls.title: Walleys Quarry Landfill Site - Latest Update - Environment Agency - Citizen Space
urls.description: Find and participate in consultations run by the Environment Agency

tweets.text:
‼️🚨 WALLEY'S - CONFIRMED BREACH OF SITE PERMIT 🚨‼️

The @EnvAgencyMids have confirmed a breach of the site permit. This is very concerning.

Clearly the odour *is* causing annoyance. I will continue to put the pressure on with the EA and at Westminster.

https://t.co/9vl5xaQgzq https://t.co/Cae8tqcrf3

Here's the environmental crisis report I delivered last night on the state of my local reservoir. I hope it can be a turning point for this historic SSSI → https://t.co/uc3ho7AR1k | @CanalRiverTrust @NaturalEngland @BarnetCouncil @Brent_Council @EnvAgency

tweets.text: @Birduder344 @EnvAgency @HantsIWWildlife I would have thought he would have needed @EnvAgency consent, this is at least the fourth time it’s been done in 20 years, imagine what an amazing wetland it would have been now if left!

My first public meeting tonight, re: Welsh Harp SSSI neglect.
Astounded at the doublespeak & circumlocution. 
Appalled at how much money is wasted. 
Angered at the lack of accountability by organisations in charge incl. @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency 
Citizens must act and monitor. https://t.co/btZLt2rlPp

Good to hear Suzanne Ward on @BBCRadioStoke talking about @EnvAgencyMids #airquality monitoring near Walleys Quarry.

Our 2 units will be in #odour report hotspots & meet monitoring best practice:
- Hamptons Housing Estate site is now live👇
- Silverdale Road site will start asap https://t.co/SGdkEn7Loh

Next BHS Webinar: 

A Flood Hydrology Roadmap for the UK - Delivery Plan for the First 7-Years

Wednesday 24th March 1-2pm

Sign up here:  https://t.co/z6jLFC28g7

By: Rob Lamb, Hannah Cloke, Sean Longfield & Nick Reynard 

@JBATrust  @UniofReading @EnvAgency @UK_CEH @hancloke

tweets.text: @WildTroutTrust @beeswaxfarming @EnvAgencyMids Great work Tim!

The team are still working hard @LuntMeadows to fix the breach in the River Alt, after recent #flooding. 

This week, the helicopter has been installing the 'clay core' which is then compacted by the excavator and added into the existing embankment at either side of the river. https://t.co/saOhv3MZWO
@OffDanielHill @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/lSm6gGeQUv

@SimonTagg @StinkStopthe @OffDanielHill @EnvAgencyMids If you go on google earth and look at the water you can see a pipe pumping something out it looks grim. I always thought this would be where some of the main issues are from all weather would affect it but some more than others rain and frost being the worst

Great work by all involved in trying to improve the area.
